title: skin idea: the unholy trinity
body:
matching skin line for just {{champion:238}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:157}} 

OR the four horsemen of the apocalypse skinline
{{champion:238}}conquest
{{champion:92}} war
{{champion:157}} death
{{champion:67}} famine

special skinline for leagues most hated and iroincally most mained champions

replies.body:
{{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:11}} 
League's Premier cancer picks already have a matching skin line. 

With Leona thrown in to be a support, because why not? PROJECT.
And "coincidentally", it's the same skin line that started the whole 'we'll give you shitty borders instead of a discount for buying this skin day 1!' shtick and the death of any skins below 975 RP. 
Even this year's April Fools skins were 1350s, a first in League history. 
(Pug'Maw, Renektoy, Definitely Not Udyr, Surprise Party Amumu ... None of these skins are 1350.)
